briefTitle: Diagnosis and Staging of Neuroendocrine Tumors (NETs) Utilizing 68Ga-DOTATOC PET/CT Scan
officialTitle: Diagnosis and Staging of Neuroendocrine Tumors (NETs) Utilizing 68Ga-DOTATOC PET/CT Scan
summary: The primary goal of the analysis is to estimate the diagnostic accuracy of Gallium 68 (68Ga) -DOTATOC PET/CT for detecting neuroendocrine tumors (NETs) compared to conventional imaging techniques such as Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) and Computerized Tomography (CT). Participants with histologically and/or clinically confirmed and/or suspected NET will be enrolled.
